    • Constructor Detail

      • Pet

        public Pet(java.lang.String theName,
           java.lang.String theTypeOfPet,
           int theAge,
           double theWeight,
           double theHeight,
           Client own)
        Constructor method for class Pet which is a pet offered by the veterinary
        Parameters:
        theName - The pet's name. This param must not be empty
        theTypeOfPet - The pet's species. This param can only be "Dog", "Cat", "Bird" or "Other"
        theAge - The pet's age
        theWeight - The pet's weight. This param must be greater than zero
        theHeight - The pet's height. This param must be greater than zero
        own - The person (object) who is the pet's owner. This param must not be null

      • showInfoPets

        Returns:

      • identifierOwner

        public java.lang.String identifierOwner()

      • IMC

        public int IMC()
        Description This method allows to calculate the body mass index for a pet. pre: The pet was created before and its attributes height and weight are not null neither height must be zero. post: The BMI is calculated.
        Returns:
        The pet body mass index. Returns -1 if the height is zero due to the division on zero does not exist.

      • addService

        public void addService(Service newService)
        When registering a new service, this method allows to add a service to the Array that a pet has pre: The service has been created before invocating this method post: The service is added to the Array that a pet has
        Parameters:
        newService - The service. This param must not be null
